name: You
text: Hey, my name is Tom are you Rick?

name: Rick
text: G G G G GET ME OUT OF HERE

name: You
text: W w w whats going on????

name: Rick
text: HES OVER THERE...HE RIGHT OVER THERE

name: Rick
text: HE'S A MAN WHO WAS MURDERED HERE ALMOST 40 YEARS AGO, IF HE FINDS YOU, YOU DIE

name: Rick
text: HOW DO YOU NOT KNOW THIS...YOU'RE IN A HAUNTED AIRPORT

name: Rick
text: MY SON LOST HIS PET ROCK WE WERE LOOKING FOR IT

name: Rick
text: NO NO NO NO NO NO

name: You
text: RICK COME BACK...YOU CAN'T LEAVE ME HERE IN THE DARK

name: Rick
text: I GOTTA FIND MY SON AND GET OUT OF HERE...YOU SHOULD LEAVE WHILE YOU CAN

name: You
text: HES IN YELLOW TERMINAL...SHOULD I GO HOME...I HAVE A CONFERENCE TO GO TO
